text: "Fool's Overture" is a 1977 song by English rock band Supertramp and is the closing track from their fifth studio album Even in the Quietest Moments.... It clocks in at nearly eleven minutes long. It talks about the Second World War and the famous Winston Churchill speech. == References == Category:1977 songs Category:Supertramp songs Category:Progressive rock songs
title: Fool's Overture
